CONSOLE ERROR: The Content Security Policy directive 'sandbox' is ignored when delivered via a <meta> element.
CONSOLE ERROR: The Content Security Policy directive 'frame-ancestors' is ignored when delivered via a <meta> element.
CONSOLE ERROR: The Content Security Policy directive 'report-uri' is ignored when delivered via a <meta> element.
This is a testharness.js-based test.
PASS Invalid directives in meta-delivered CSP
Harness: the test ran to completion.
